name: Advanced-Image-Hosting-Script
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: AIHS is a highly-flexible advanced image hosting solution for anyone who wants to offer an image hosting services of any kind.

matches.text: .title                          { font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 150%; color: #FFFFFF; height: 26px; background-image: url(./tile_back.gif) }

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<tr><td class=info width=100%>Welcome to install Advanced Image Hosting Script Pro ([\d\.]+) on your server<\/td><\/tr>)
